backend/main.mo: Defines core game data types, player profiles, combat structures, clan data, and initializes key maps for profiles, combat, clans, joins, and dungeons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries referencing specific frontend files and required UI or logic updates for killers, bosses, and admin pet options.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all major frontend files, covering routing, UI components, gameplay pages, and new dungeon and clan systems.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication gate, profile setup, routing, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper that manages login/logout via Internet Identity and displays login UI when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation tabs, currency display, logout handling, and main content container.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: UI dialog that lets a user create a new player profile, calling useCreatePlayerProfile on button click.
frontend/src/components/ProgressionPanel: Displays a survivorâ€™s level, experience progress, and core stats with icons and progress bars.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and logout handling for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks that call backend actor methods for profiles, survivors, equipment, and admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light/dark modes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin UI allowing users with permissions to grant currency, manage killers, levels, weapons, and pets.
frontend/src/pages/ClansPage.tsx: Displays clans and join listings, allowing users to create listings, create clans from listings, or join existing or random clans.
frontend/src/pages/DungeonPage.tsx: Shows available dungeons and lets users start quests, complete them, and unlock crates while tracking rewards and progress.
frontend/src/pages/GameplayPage.tsx: Provides combat gameplay where users select enemies, start battles, perform attacks, and view combat logs and results.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home hub displaying user stats and navigation cards for survivors, combat, inventory, killers, shop, and admin sections.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Displays the user's weapons and pets and allows equipping items with indicators for currently equipped gear.
frontend/src/pages/KillersPage.tsx: Displays the player's killers, their unlock status, stats, and provides a button to unlock the next killer.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shows shop items, especially the purchasable Admin Panel, and handles purchase logic with currency checks.
frontend/src/pages/SurvivorsPage.tsx: Manages creation, listing, and activation of survivors with a dialog for entering custom stats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugin support.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing game features, versions, requirements, and current implemented functionality.
